bioAsHtml: With over 25 years of experience covering many positions and magnitude of leading technologies to ensure their use results in a successful project that delivers benefits for both the customer and the end user. Currently, my role is to enable developers in the use of services available on IBM Bluemix for composing their solutions.
bio:
With over 25 years of experience covering many positions and magnitude of leading technologies to ensure their use results in a successful project that delivers benefits for both the customer and the end user. 
Currently, my role is to enable developers in the use of services available on IBM Bluemix for composing their solutions.
